item.description:
Hop on board Laugh Tracks - a cleverly engineered evening of improvisational comedy - and let us "entertrain" you!

Aboard the Essex Clipper, Laugh Tracks is presented by Comedy on Demand (COD) - Riverway Studio's popular improvisational comedy troupe based in East Haddam, CT. The wildly funny show consists of skits, songs and improv games using suggestions from audience members who want to jump in on the "loco"-motive antics!

This hilarious comedy tour includes a 2 1/2 hour train ride and light dinner:

Chicken Caesar Salad Wrap or Vegetable Wrap
Fruit and Brownie
Cost is $45.00 per person upon making reservations. Full bar service is available on board with cash or credit card.

So, join the gang for a freight car full of fun . . . this joke-filled journey is guaranteed to leave you laughing! Reservations are a must, and due by June 15.
item.how_to_find_us: Don and Sharon are the hosts. And reservations are required by June 15! After you reserve, they can finalize the plans with those who are attending.
item.name: Laugh Tracks
